turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need a Starbucks caramel macchiato Venti with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said a venti caramel macchiato with 2% is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 75th in Woodridge, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i send your order there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caramel macchiato with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on 75th and woodridge. your order will be ready for pickup in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, can i help with anything else?
